list.name: POPPING-PINCUSHION
list.description: Spike aims and fires a wave of needles that deal <!card.accessory.skill.damage.scaleToLevel> damage.
list.descriptionHtml: Spike aims and fires a wave of needles that deal damage.

list.name: LIFE-PLANT
list.description: Spike throws a large cactus with <!card.accessory.skill.summonedCharacter.maxHealth.scaleToLevel> health to give cover to teammates. If destroyed, the cactus bursts, and all nearby teammates recover <!card.accessory.skill.cactusMinionHealing.scaleToLevel> health.
list.descriptionHtml: Spike throws a large cactus with health to give cover to teammates. If destroyed, the cactus bursts, and all nearby teammates recover health.
